message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair.
Your offer was a bit too lopsided, Alice. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  We both lose money if this drags on.
I understand your point about losing value, Bob. How about we meet closer to the middle? This offer still gives you a slight advantage considering the inflation rates.
Alice, time is literally money in this game!  This offer is a good compromise, and it lets us both walk away with something substantial.
Bob, I'm trying to find a compromise here.  This offer acknowledges the time pressure but still reflects the faster rate of inflation on my end.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point.  Any more rounds and we'll both be losing out significantly.
